limericks.txt

    There was a man from killaloe
    who stepped in a massive dog poo
    he declared "I'm aware,
    I'm in Tipp, not in Clare"
    and in Ballina scraped clean his shoe

# first limerick

There was a young mensch from latter
Who stages a pepsi drank pat her
purpose brand drinks
eat eat food pinks
bar diet at her
-Limerickinator '17
